item.title: Dead fox in the middle of the road, 10th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich New Road, London

item.title: The road surface has dropped causing blocked drains and affects house foundation, 10th June
item.description:
The road surface has dropped (it has already been repaired several times) which has caused blocked sewage drains and currently blocked rainwater connection to the main drain. When a car passes over the subsided area of road the water level in our toilet moves and if it's a heavy truck the foundations of our property vibrate. Can you please look at the effect this ongoing subsidence is having and not just repair the road as I suspect there could be a more serious issue beneath the road surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willett Way, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Possible abandoned vehicle with no MOT, 10th June
item.description:
There has been a vehicle I’ve never seen on the road before, parked with no movement for around 4 weeks now. This vehicle also has no MOT.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pennine Way, North End, London

item.title: Low hand branches, 10th June
item.description:
Outside the property there are very low branches today a truck has come up the road and has hit the branches causing damage. Some of the branches are now hanging down. There was a very loud bang as the truck hit the trees if someone was outside, they would’ve been severely hurt . Some of the that have been here don’t look safe and could fall Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cocksure Lane, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
